import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } isShowDivIf = true; toggleDisplayDivIf() { this.isShowDivIf = !this.isShowDivIf; } ngOnInit(): void {} }
